org.apache.jmeter.protocol.ssh.sampler

Class SSHCommandSamplerExtra

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jmeter.testelement.AbstractTestElement
      • org.apache.jmeter.samplers.AbstractSampler
        • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.ssh.sampler.AbstractSSHMainSampler
          • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.ssh.sampler.AbstractSSHSamplerExtra
            • org.apache.jmeter.protocol.ssh.sampler.SSHCommandSamplerExtra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.apache.jmeter.engine.util.ConfigMergabilityIndicator, org.apache.jmeter.gui.Searchable, org.apache.jmeter.samplers.Sampler, org.apache.jmeter.testbeans.TestBean, org.apache.jmeter.testelement.TestElement

    public class SSHCommandSamplerExtra
extends AbstractSSHSamplerExtra
    SSH Sampler that collects single lines of output and returns them as samples. It's using an exec channel to send the commands and receive the return values
    See Also:

      • sample

        public org.apache.jmeter.samplers.SampleResult sample(org.apache.jmeter.samplers.Entry e)

      • doCommand

        private java.lang.String doCommand(com.jcraft.jsch.Session session,
                                   java.lang.String command,
                                   org.apache.jmeter.samplers.SampleResult res)
                            throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Executes a the given command inside a short-lived channel in the session. Performance could be likely improved by reusing a single channel, though the gains would be minimal compared to sharing the Session.
        Parameters:
        session - Session in which to create the channel
        command - Command to send to the server for execution
        Returns:
        All standard output from the command
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        java.io.IOException - Error has occurred down in the network layer
